com.ardic.android.iotignite.interfaces

Interface IIotIgniteManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IotIgniteManager

    public interface IIotIgniteManager
    Entry point of IotIgnite library. Getting this IotIgniteManager instance you can easily connect your Node's & Thing's to ARCloud.
    Author:
    ARDIC

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Node> getAllNodes()
      Get all registered Node's to context.
      Node getNodeByID(String nodeID) 
      List<Node> getNodeByName(String nodeName) 

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeByID

        Node getNodeByID(String nodeID)
          throws AuthenticationException
        Parameters:
        nodeID - : Unique id of Node.
        nodeObjectCallback - : Returns Node object named "nodeID" if exists. If there is no such a Node returns NULL object.
        Returns:
        Node : Node object of specified ID.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
        See Also:
        Thing, IotIgniteManager

      • getNodeByName

        List<Node> getNodeByName(String nodeName)
                  throws AuthenticationException
        Parameters:
        nodeName - : Human readable name of Node.
        Returns:
        nodeList : List of Node's. Node name is not unique. User have can have zero to many Node's which has same name.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
        See Also:
        Thing, IotIgniteManager

      • getAllNodes

        List<Node> getAllNodes()
                throws AuthenticationException
        Get all registered Node's to context. List of Node objects. Returns empty list if there is none.
        Returns:
        nodeList : Get registered Node list.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
